name: WarehouseReference
description: warehouse-service internal reference to Warehouse entity contract from Location
accessNote: warehouse-service fulfils both Warehouse and Location; Location references parent Warehouse via direct database query

requiredFields.name: id
requiredFields.description: Warehouse unique identifier - required when querying locations for a warehouse

requiredFields.name: code
requiredFields.description: Warehouse code - identity field used for location display

usagePoints.purpose: Provides WarehouseId and WarehouseCode identity fields in location response

notes: This is an internal reference as warehouse-service owns both entities. Location stores warehouseId and resolves warehouse data via internal query when building LocationDtos
